name: Maze Man
overview: Not to be confused with Maze-Man from CP Verlag, which is a Pac-Man style game. This game is actually a computerized version of the popular pen and paper maze escape games. Escape the maze within in certain time period to try to beat the time of the last player (or your own last score). Pressing the fire button draws a new maze. This was developed by Victor Terrana and published in Loadstar #74.
